tika-abh02t20:3_2: Tattha paṭhamachakke tāva pathavītejovāyodhātuyo sabhāvato phoṭṭhabbadhātu.

tika-abh02t20:3_13: Evamettha chasu chasu dhātūsu aṭṭhārasannaṁ dhātūnaṁ samavarodho daṭṭhabbo.

tika-abh02t20:31_10: Na cettha samudāyārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā samudāyābhogasseva abhāvato,
